## useStorage() function

Get the configured `Web3sdksStorage` instance

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useStorage():
  | import("@web3sdks/storage").Web3sdksStorage<
      import("@web3sdks/storage").IpfsUploadBatchOptions
    >
  | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

import("@web3sdks/storage").Web3sdksStorage&lt;import("@web3sdks/storage").IpfsUploadBatchOptions&gt; \| undefined

The `storageInterface` configured on the `Web3sdksProvider`
